lead.title: JS13k Games
lead.text: A yearly contest for very small javascript games.

sections.title: project description
sections.text: JS13k Games is a yearly contest which requires contestants to make very small games in Javascript which run in the browser. The entire source and asset package must be less than 13kb - a difficult challenge. The contest runs for 30 days in each year in September.

sections.title: my role
sections.text: I designed, did artwork, created architeture and implemented the code on all the games entered in this contest.

sections.title: technology
sections.text: As required by the rules only Javascript and native browser capabilities are used. Due to the size liitations no grahics, physics or other upport libraries are practical.
